parameter.name: fixedCostItems
parameter.description: A single fixed cost item object or an array of fixed cost item objects. Mandotory fields:name,cost.

parameter.name: lineItems
parameter.description: A single line item object or an array of line item objects. Mandotory fields:name,cost.

parameter.name: staffRates
parameter.description: A single staff rate object or an array of staff rate objects. Mandotory fields:contactid (ID of Staff Contact), rate (cost per hour) and time (in minutes).

parameter.name: taskRates
parameter.description: A single task rate object or an array of task rate objects. Mandotory fields:name, rate (cost per hour) and time (in minutes).

parameter.name: apiFields
parameter.description: The API Field Value/s. Mandotory fields:id and value.

parameter.name: isClientView
parameter.description: The ClientView, true - Client can view Quote, false - Client cannot view Quote. Default:false.

parameter.name: discountValue
parameter.description: The discount value. Can be given as number or number% .

parameter.name: number
parameter.description: The number. Possible values:number - Number,auto - Use Autonumbering. Default:auto.

parameter.name: projectId
parameter.description: The projectId,to which quote should be attached to.

parameter.name: quotedDate
parameter.description: The quoted date. Specific date - Date in yyyy-mm-dd format, Relative date - +/-Xd/w/m/y. Default:current date.

parameter.name: taxable
parameter.description: The taxable status, true - Taxable, false - Non-Taxable. Default:true.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The quote type. Possible values:estimate,quote. Default:quote.

parameter.name: validToDate
parameter.description: The valid to date. Specific date - Date in yyyy-mm-dd format, Relative date - +/-Xd/w/m/y (if not specified then this will be calculated automatically from Quoted Date and default payment settings).
